casebody.data:
STATE
v.
DANGLER. 2017-1703 Supreme Court of Ohio. March 26, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

On appellee's motion for appointment of counsel. Motion granted. Karin L. Coble is appointed to represent appellee, contingent upon appellee's filing an affidavit of indigence within 20 days.
